welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lower Merion, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Wings Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights at Wings Field Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, used for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
